resources.string: This app is not supported on your device
Currently we\'re not able to access camera on this device
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
We found that camera captured a corrupted video
Unable to switch the camera, recording is in progress
Camera has been stopped, please tap on restart to continue recording
The camera permission is needed to use this feature.
The fine location permission is needed for core functionality.
Fine location permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.
The background location permission is needed for enhanced functionality.
Background location permission was denied but needed for enhanced functionality.
Draw over other app permission not available. Closing the application
Draw over other app permission not available.
Please wait. Restarting nayan hover service.
Please enable auto rotate, hover mode only works in landscape mode…
Please wait while we\'re starting your video upload service…
Data usage limit exceeded for the day
Unable to upload on the current network
Battery is low, please put your phone on charge before you start uploading videos
Socket timeout exception, we\'re unable to upload videos right now on our servers. Please try again after some time.
Something went wrong, we\'re unable to upload videos right now on our servers. Please try again after some time.
We\'re unable to connect our servers. Please try again after some time.
You need to sign in or sign up before continuing.
Server storage limit reached, upload after sometime
Please wait. Starting Nayan main recorder.
Please wait opening portrait hover mode.
Recording is not allowed.Please tilt your device to continue recording.
Not enough memory to record videos.
Allow Nayan to use location all of the time to Help the City Fight Problems
The camera permission is needed for this feature
Nayan will use background location permission while working in hover mode
Camera is stopped due to some issue, please tap on restart
Couldn\'t upload, please check the usage data limit
Current temperature: %1$s°C, Your device is overheating.
"Device is heating up reducing the video FPS, Current temperature %1$s°C. Video recording will not be supported if device temperature is above %2$s°C.
Temperature threshold reached, current temperature: %1$s°C, shutting down camera services
You\'re not allowed to record consecutive videos
Please contact our support team in order to rectify this issue
Unable to run AI, Not enough memory (%1$s), Please close other apps.
WARNING:\n Threshold for allowed videos reached, we have disabled AI, please use manual trigger to record video.
Unable to record video, Location unavailable.
Your device is currently in offline mode, Location unavailable.
Please wait while we\'re syncing assets…
Please wait while we\'re downloading assets…
Please wait while we\'re uploading assets…
WARNING: \nDrive on different road. Driving Restricted!
Drive slowly (Max 40 kph allowed) since we\'re not able to capture videos above this speed.
WARNING: \nMotionless content detected, \nplease stop recording if not driving.
WARNING: \nDrive in surge location in order to allow us recording videos.
Hover mode can not function properly without Location enabled.
Network connection unavailable. Check your internet connection and try again.
It\'s going to take only a few seconds
Tap \"Connect\" when you get the prompt from your device
Navigate to your device Settings > Wifi > Choose \'DDPAIXXXX\' > Connect (default password: 1234567890)
WARNING: \n\nMove to an open area, in order for the drone to get a GPS fix.
Please wait while we\'re verifying uploaded video files status on server
The Nayan App utilizes your device\'s camera and location data to identify and report roadway grievances in the vicinity, even when the app is not actively in use.

string-array.name: drone_names
string-array.item: * Phantom 4, Phantom 4 Pro & Phantom 4 Advanced, Phantom 4 Pro V2.0, P4 Multispectral
* Matrice 600 & Matrice 600 Pro, RTK and Ronin MX
* Osmo, Osmo Pro, Osmo RAW & Osmo+
* Lightbridge 2 with standalone A3 or N3
